attributes.action: make sure that our country is kept a christian country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our country was built on chritian values, christian principles, and christian morals. we should not bend to laws to be made that go against the teachings of Christ. also all laws passed must be favourable to christians more that any other religion opinion or moral

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
